mapper.insert: insert into user_data(user_type, user_ID, user_PW, user_name, user_phoneNum, user_email, company_name, company_type, company_licensee, company_location, thumbnail) values (#{user_type}, #{user_ID}, #{user_PW}, #{user_name}, #{user_phoneNum}, #{user_email}, #{company_name}, #{company_type}, #{company_licensee}, #{company_location}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.update: update user_data set user_type = #{user_type}, user_ID = #{user_ID}, user_PW = #{user_PW}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_phoneNum = #{user_phoneNum}, user_email = #{user_email}, company_name = #{company_name}, company_type = #{company_type}, company_licensee = #{company_licensee}, company_location= #{company_location}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, updateDate = now() where user_idx = #{user_idx}
